articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Axiom-3 Mission Launch LIVE: Four European astronauts to begin journey to space - India Today
articles.description: The mission, which marks the first all-European commercial astronaut mission, will be broadcast live, offering viewers around the globe a front-row seat to the mission.
articles.content:
The Axiom-3 mission is set to launch four European astronauts to the International Space Station (ISS) in the wee hours of Thursday.
